description: This app is great for religion students to learn about different forms of christianity

My initial review was to get the rating fixed, which was done, but someone didn't like that my review was critical and removed the opposing view (don't do that guys, you aren't that fragile, I promise).



True faith comes from within, from personal epiphany not from being told it's what you *must* believe, which the dev seems to get, but the person moderating reviews, does not.



Two stars, both for the dev being receptive to critisicm, -3 stars, all for the moderation. -.-
